resources.string: ADVAITAM, the annual Techno-Cultural fest of NIT Agartala, one of the largest of its kind in the North-East. This occasion challenge the students to push further their intellect, imagination and innovation, striving as a rendezvous where the creativity and brilliance of people from all fortes will be on display. Its a humble yet magnanimous attempt to provide a platform for the youth to unleash their skills of technology, science and management amidst severe competition and to bestow them with immense inspiration and zeal. \n\nThe fest also features enriched cultural programmes and concerts to content variant moods and tastes at the same time rejuvenate the energy levels of the youngsters. Coupled with technology and culture, the four days at Advaitam create a new dimension to learn and enjoy at the same time.

Lead developers : 
Ananda Bibek Ray
Anirban Bhowmik 

Winter Internship 2016 participants : 
Aayush Gupta
Rakesh Das 

...and a little help from fairies and elves
